Package renderer

Class Render

java.lang.Object
renderer.Render
public class Render
extends java.lang.Object
render class to create color matrix from the scene
Author:
Noam and Netenl

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  Render.Pixel
    Pixel is an internal helper class whose objects are associated with a Render object that they are generated in scope of.

  • Constructor Details

    • Render

      public Render​(ImageWriter imageWriter, Scene scene, boolean _isGlossy, boolean _printStats)
      CTOR for render class
      Parameters:
      imageWriter - to save the image from scene that cam see
      scene - the scene (geometries etc.) that cam see
      _isGlossy - is the scene have gloss
      _printStats - show statistics

    • Render

      CTOR if glossy is undefined
      Parameters:
      imageWriter - image writer of render
      scene - scene of image

    • printGrid

      public void printGrid​(int interval, java.awt.Color color)
      function to print the grid above the image
      Parameters:
      interval - the distance between lines in grid (distance between pixels)
      color - color of grid line

    • printStat

      private void printStat​(int i, int j)
      print the percentage of pixels we did get the y and x of pixel
      Parameters:
      i - column
      j - row

    • writeToImage

      public void writeToImage()
      function that write the image in memory by calling the function of the ImageWriter field in this class

    • findClosestIntersection

      private Intersectable.GeoPoint findClosestIntersection​(Ray ray)
      find the closest point that intersect with the ray
      Parameters:
      ray - ray to find when it intersect
      Returns:
      Point3D or null if there is none

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint geopoint, Ray inRay)
      used as a start the calc color function, and adds the ambient light.
      Parameters:
      geopoint - point to calc the color
      inRay - ray that hit the point
      Returns:
      color of point

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint p, Ray inRay, int level, double k)
      recursive function for calculate color
      Parameters:
      p - point that we search its color
      inRay - the ray of light
      level - level of recursion
      k - the additional color
      Returns:
      color of point

    • calcRaysColor

      private Color calcRaysColor​(java.util.List<Ray> rays, Intersectable.GeoPoint point, int level, double kx, double kkx)
      calculate the colors for an array of rays.
      Parameters:
      rays - list of rays to calc the colors
      point - point that rays hit
      level - level of recursion
      kx - kt or kr
      kkx - kkt or kkr
      Returns:
      average color

    • fewColors

      private boolean fewColors​(java.util.List<Ray> rays, Intersectable.GeoPoint point, int level, double kx, double kkx)
      check if few rays are the same color
      Parameters:
      rays - list of rays
      point - point they hit
      level - level of recursion
      kx - kt or kr
      kkx - kkt or kkr
      Returns:
      true or false

    • getLSColors

      private Color getLSColors​(Intersectable.GeoPoint p, Point3D getPoint, Color color, Vector v, Vector n, int nShininess, double kd, double ks, double k)
      calculate the color of a the light sources.
      Parameters:
      p - point that light hit
      getPoint - point of
      color - color of point
      v - vector from light
      n - normal vector
      nShininess - shininess of point
      kd - kd of light source
      ks - value of ks in material
      k - the additional of color
      Returns:
      color of light source

    • calcDiffusive

      private Color calcDiffusive​(double kD, double nl, Color lightIntensity)
      function to calc the diffuse of light reflection
      Parameters:
      kD - value of diffusive
      nl - normal of geometry * direction of light source
      lightIntensity - intensity of light source
      Returns:
      color of diffusive

    • calcSpecular

      private Color calcSpecular​(double kS, Vector l, double nl, Vector n, Vector v, int nShininess, Color lightIntensity)
      function to calc the specular of light reflection
      Parameters:
      kS - value of ks in material
      l - vector to point from light source
      nl - normal vector from point * l vector
      n - normal from point
      v - vector from camera
      nShininess - shininess of point
      lightIntensity - intensity of light
      Returns:
      color of specular

    • transparency

      private double transparency​(Vector l, Vector n, Intersectable.GeoPoint gp, LightSource ls)
      transparency check if this geoPoint is have some other object between the light. this function replace unshaded function
      Parameters:
      l - vector from light to geoPoint
      n - vector normal
      gp - geoPoint
      ls - light
      Returns:
      double of how much shade.

    • renderImage

      public void renderImage()
      This function renders image's pixel color map from the scene included with the Renderer object

    • setMultithreading

      public Render setMultithreading​(int threads)
      Set multithreading
      - if the parameter is 0 - number of coress less 2 is taken
      Parameters:
      threads - number of threads
      Returns:
      the Render object itself
